Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="IN_STATUSES_DATA" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Protocol" Type="System.String" Value="Remoting"/> <Attribute Name="Procedure" Type="System.String" Value="SCN_CHANGE_LIFETIME_STATUS_BULK"/> <Attribute Name="CLIENT_ID" Type="System.String" Value="SPA"/> <Attribute Name="REQUEST_ID" Type="System.String" Value="{0}-{3}-{4}"/> <Attribute Name="IN_STATUSES_DATA" Type="System.Data.DataSet" Value=""/> </Attributes> <DataTable Name="REQUEST_DATA"> <Columns> <Column Name="REQUEST_ID" Type="System.String"/> </Columns> <Rows> <Row REQUEST_ID="reversecut({0},4)-{4}"/> </Rows> </DataTable> <DataTable Name="PA_STATUSES"> <Columns> <Column Name="PA_ID" Type="System.Int64"/> <Column Name="PA_STATUS" Type="System.Int32"/> </Columns> <Rows> <Row PA_ID="{1}" PA_STATUS="{2}"/> </Rows> </DataTable> </DataSet>
